thread.title: Kingsman 2 gets a summer 2017 release date - Movies
thread.title_full: Kingsman 2 gets a summer 2017 release date - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Rachel Babbage
title: Kingsman 2 gets a summer 2017 release date - Movies
text: Kingsman 2 has had a release date set - we're getting our second glimpse of the secret agents on June 16, 2017. It isn't known yet whether Kingsman: The Secret Service's director Matthew Vaughn will be back in the chair. Â© 20th Century Fox 8 great films cursed by bad endings: Did Kingsman really need that anal sex joke?The sequel begins shooting in April 2016, with Robin Hood: Origins having made way for it.Colin Firth starred in the first film alongside Samuel L Jackson, Mark Strong, Taron Egerton and Michael Caine.Vaughn previously said that Firth could return in a sequel and Eggsy (Egerton) would remain a key character.The only competition currently scheduled on Kingsman 2's June 16, 2017 release date is Pixar's Cars 3.Watch a trailer for the first movie below: function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4027284890001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14027284890001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4027284890001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4027284890001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14027284890001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4027284890001.init(); ai_type="video"; }
